title: Reading List | #2 - 'A Pattern Language'
itunes:title: Reading List | #2 - 'A Pattern Language'
description: My second architectural book recommendation is 'A Pattern Language' by Christopher Alexander et al. Here I talk about how this book is useful to architects and architecture students and why you should read it.
